item.title: NPC Spawn List & Item List [ANSWERED]
item.dc:creator: @Duff1 Duff™
item.description:
@Duff1 wrote:

Hello.

1. Could anyone tell me where abouts the NPC spawn list is roughly located please? Because I want to edit out some NPC’s and put in new ones… I just can’t find the file where it has the NPC ID, coords. etc… (What is it normally called?) In my NPCHandler.Java it has this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 166) { // Gnome Banker - Starter Island if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Type ::rules before you play!"; } }

But there is no coords so it isn’t the spawn…

2. Does anyone know how to access the item list where you can actually edit the names and examine info. of the items? Unless it is ItemList.Java… but I don’t want to mess about with anything until I am absolutely sure.

If it helps, my server source is TeleScape.

Your help will be greatly appreciated and if you even have the slightest idea, please feel free to post.

Read full topic
